# Makefile 內容
[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

Makefile 包含：  
  
-   [描述區塊](../build/description-blocks.md)  
  
-   [命令](../build/commands-in-a-makefile.md)  
  
-   [巨集](../build/macros-and-nmake.md)  
  
-   [推斷規則](../build/inference-rules.md)  
  
-   [點指示詞](../build/dot-directives.md)  
  
-   [前置處理器指示詞](../build/makefile-preprocessing.md)  
  
## 備註  
 您可以在 Makefile 中使用的其他功能有[萬用字元](../build/wildcards-and-nmake.md)、[長檔名](../build/long-filenames-in-a-makefile.md)、[註解](../build/comments-in-a-makefile.md)以及[特殊字元](../build/special-characters-in-a-makefile.md)。  
  
 如需範例，請參閱[範例 Makefile](../build/sample-makefile.md)。
